name: The Pro Yakyuu: Pennant Race
overview: The Pro Yakyuu: Pennant Race is a baseball game for the Sega Master System. Released only in Japan, it was an upgrade of Great Baseball, a title not released in Japan. Apart from localisation of players and teams for the Japanese market the game was significantly altered, including amongst other things a bird's-eye view of play as opposed to Great Baseball's isometric view.
